attributes.action: Stop describing Brexit as "the biggest democratic exercise in history"
attributes.additional_details: This piece of misleading propaganda has been used throughout the Brexit process to very damaging effect. It has been deployed to make the EU referendum appear to be a uniquely significant democratic event and hence unassailable.
attributes.background: Government repeats this endlessly despite it not being true. The 1992 general election had a higher absolute turnout and numerous elections have had higher percentage turnouts. This is a matter of record. The government has a duty not to mislead the electorate.

rejection.details: It's not the Government's or Parliament's responsibility to decide how people describe Brexit.
